result.execSummary:
The defendant Dwight A White was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Costs to be paid at $25.00 per month, commencing 04-01-2016, alternate 9 days jail.  Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

Court orders 45 days in Waukesha County Jail. Concurrent with present sentence. 36 days credit.
Concurrent with: Present sentence

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Dwight A White in court, in custody, with Attorney John P Carlson.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern Kelly Pingel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count #2.  Court performs plea colloquy and finds Defendant guilty of Count #2.  Count #4 is dismissed and read-in.  State gives sentencing recommendations.  Attorney Carlson makes statements regarding sentencing.  Defendant makes statements.  Court sentences the Defendant to the following:

COUNT #2:  IMPOSED SENTENCE OF:   

45 DAYS JAIL  (36 days credit)      **CONCURRENT WITH PRESENT SENTENCE** 

COSTS:  $253.00 & $200.00 DNA surcharge (to be paid at $25.00 per month, commencing 4/1/16, alternate 9 days)

**Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.**

DEFENDANT TO BE RETURNED FORTHWITH
Defendant to have no contact with any Walmart stores.  Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.

Defendant Dwight A White in court, in custody by video conference from Milwaukee Secure Detention Facility, with attorney John P Carlson.   Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant to be released 3/7/2016.    NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for February 12, 2016 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Dwight A White
Current: P.O. Box 05911, c/o Milwaukee Secure Detention Facility, Milwaukee, WI 53205-0911 United States  (Effective: 12-17-2015)
Prior: 9099 N 75th St #205, Milwaukee, WI 53223

Attorney John P Carlson in court.   Defendant Dwight A White did not appear.   Michele W. Hulgaard appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is in custody in Milwaukee Secure Detention Facilty. Court orders Defendant to appear by video at next hearing.  Initial appearance scheduled for January 7, 2016 at 11:00 am.
